amendatorysection.catchline: Local hospital district; security in lieu of bond authorized.
amendatorysection.para: In lieu of a bond as provided in sections 77-2373 to 77-2377, any bank, capital stock financial institution, or qualifying mutual financial institution making application to become a depository under sections 77-2369 to 77-2385 may give security as provided in the Public Funds Deposit Security Act to the secretary-treasurer. Section 77-2366 shall apply to deposits in capital stock financial institutions. Section 77-2365.01 shall apply to deposits in qualifying mutual financial institutions.

crossreference.para: Public Funds Deposit Security Act, see section 77-2386.
